poem:
**The Art of Uncoupling**

In the Spanish way,  
they curate the ending—  
a party, an exhibit  
of fond farewells  
in place of the echoing hallway.  
Years compressed to a single night,  
conversations unspooling  
like film reel tangling,  
the director and the actor  
write their closing lines,  
no bitterness, just  
the soft dissolve  
into separate frames.
